title: GIP: 001 Universal Grey Income
body:
## Abstract
Create a steady source of $GREY for users who cross a certain threshold of ownership for incubation purposes as well as incentivization.

## Purpose
- Incentivize members to be active in the GREY DAO discord
- Provide an equalization mechanism to ensure fairness of distribution
- Provide an immutable and decentralized source of $GREY supply
- Incubate creatives of all sorts
## Implementation / mechanism
The UGI (Universal Grey Income) claim system will take the form of a smart contract with a `claim` function. The initial liquidity for the $GREY pool will be provided by the token deployer, but in future this could be used as a utility function. The UGI 'airdrop' is only claimable after a certain threshold, to be decided by the community. Another thing to note is that as an equalization mechanism, the more $GREY you own, the less you may claim. The equation that calculates $GREY allowance is yet to be decided, but will likely take the form of a 'diminishing returns' graph.
author: 0xdAB0A5d15ff6B75E69256c29609d2Fc3eBbFEb04
